overview:
Eric Y. Huang is an experienced technologist and the co-founder and CEO of SkyGlue.com - a powerful web analytics solution built on top of Google Analytics.

Before starting SkyGlue, Eric worked at Microsoft and he was the first developer for Microsoftâ€™s first cloud messaging service (Azure AppFabric ServiceBus service) from incubation to production release. Prior to that, he also worked in IBM Research and SONY.

Eric has a Ph.D. in Computer Science from Indiana University - Bloomington with a focus on distributed computing and cloud computing. Eric has two patents pending and one patent issued.
